name: Cyber-Death: Recoded
description:
The doors of the arena swing open, a group of mechanical monstrosities flowing out. You grip your scythe hard, steeling yourself for a fight. Three swings de-rez the whirring drones that attack you. A heavy chop downwards cuts the huge artillery drone in half, netting you some bolts. As you contemplate going back to the shop after this wave a punch knocks you off your feet. The number of bots have almost doubled. This is going to be a long day.

Team: John Mordi, Zal Daboo, Jessica Barthelt, Kyle Manning, Kyron Patterson, Kyle Fuller
